nodes.text: Heist at the Twin Horns Storage

Around 18 BBY, Milo and Lina Graf mounted a heist to retrieve the head of their droid CR-8R, which the Mon Calamari crime lord Rask Odai kept in his office at the Twin Horns Storage building. Little did the Grafs know that the helpful chef Shalla Mondatha, who helped them infiltrate the building by hiding them in a crate of live Wakizan beetles, was in fact a bounty hunter hired by Captain Visler Korda to retrieve precious cartographic data contained in CR-8R's head.

After infiltrating Rask's office, the Grafs bought time with a fake fire alarm, which allowed them to recover the droid's head. They then escaped via a water tube route that the mon Calamari uses to fill his water tank. Instead of reuniting with Shalla Mondatha, the children were rescued outside the building by Ephraim Bridger, a Lothalite who broadcast revolutionary messages.
